column4: Anyone...if I installed grub to my linux partition and that was on the 2nd partition of the first drive at the beginning of the partition, would it be hd0,2
hd0 is the first drive yes?
so the last number does not mean beginning or end of the partition?
so all agreed that hd0,1 means the 2nd partition on the first drive
are you sure now cos this will rape my pc if its wrong
it can always be rescued.. and on the question of how sure I am, I've been working with bootloaders for about a week nonstop now =D
so if my windows install is on the first partition it would be hd0,0
Can anyone help with Install? http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/6663
